data.description: Getting tired of mowing the lawn or shoveling the snow? This cute ranch condo in South Lyon welcomes you with its glistening floors, beautifully accentuated by the wealth of natural light flooding in as you walk in the door. The first room you'll see is the lovely living room. With plenty of room for the whole family to sit around and enjoy a good movie together! This home features a great open and airy feeling throughout the home, making entertaining a breeze here! The cute dining area is perfect for family dinners with a stunning light fixture. Moving into the kitchen you will find a flush-mounted sink for easy clean-up and a wealth of cabinet space all around. In the master suite, you will find cozy carpeting, a lovely ensuite, and a walk-in closet! This home also features a finished basement with the laundry room and more room for anything you like! This condo location is amazing! Walking distance to restaurants, shopping and schools!!
